none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 27, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Howling, filthy, raw, primitive metal. Nothing tight or concise, nothing professional or clean....this is about as primal as it gets, and proof once again that the $1 castaway bins of the world still overflow with bounty. I'm back....did you miss me? WHORELORD
